history.proof: rewrite /pairmap. elim: s => [|x s IHs] //=. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of IHs [seq f i | i <- (fix pairmap (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : seq T0 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => g x y :: pairmap y s' end) x0 s] does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment T : Type T0 : Type T1 : Type f : T0 -> T1 g : T -> T -> T0 x0, x : T s : seq T IHs : [seq f i | i <- (fix pairmap (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : seq T0 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => g x y :: pairmap y s' end) x0 s] = (fix pairmap (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : seq T1 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => f (g x y) :: pairmap y s' end) x0 s Unable to unify "f (g x0 x) :: (fix pairmap (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : seq T1 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => f (g x y) :: pairmap y s' end) x s" with "f (g x0 x) :: [seq f i | i <- (fix pairmap (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : seq T0 := match s with | [::] => [::] | y :: s' => g x y :: pairmap y s' end) x s]".

original: rewrite /pairmap. elim: s => [|x s IHs] //=. rewrite /pairmap in IHs. rewrite IHs. reflexivity.
